project.name: Practice Greenhealth: Phase 0 Planning and Discovery
project.overview:
The purpose of the Phase 0 project is to produce a detailed specification and plan for development. Upon completion of this portion of the project, Client will receive a finalized Project Plan. During the Project Plan phase DesignHammer will fully define tasks, requirements, and development plans.

Project Tasks

The tasks conducted by DesignHammer resources under this SOW will include the following:

  • Collaborate with Client to formally document project goals, project timeframe, and deliver Project Plan document for Phase 1 development.
  • Conduct meetings with organization’s stakeholders to further clarify current processes and future goals. Stakeholders could include helpline staff, executive project sponsors and the IT personnel managing the project.
  • Hold meeting with client’s core project team to present findings of discovery phase.
  • Provide a plan for the development/implementation various solutions and support.

Scope of Phase 0: Planning and Discovery

DesignHammer will focus on planning and discovery targeting the following features and functionality for the Phase 1 deployment:

  • Awards Application and Review Workflow
  • Role-based User Access
  • User Accounts Syncing to Salesforce
  • Awards Application Syncing to Salesforce
  • Awards Reporting
  • User Access to the Legacy Drupal 6 website

The specific functionality targeted for the Phase 1 deployment will be determined during Phase 0.

Project Planning Questionnaire and Workbook

DesignHammer will provide the client with a Project Planning Questionnaire and Salesforce Planning Workbook. The client should complete these with a focus on how they apply to the new Environmental Excellence Awards System and User Access. The completed versions of these should be returned by 9/06/13.

Project Management

The follow meetings will be included in this SOW:

  • Project Kick-Off meeting (9/16/13)
  • Draft Project Plan Review meeting (9/23/13)
  • Final Project Plan Presentation meeting (9/30/13)

Project Plan

The Project Plan is a formal document that outlines the timeframe for development, proposed features and functionality, costs for development, and project goals. A draft of the Project Plan will be provided to the Client by 9/20/13 for review and feedback (if Client provided all necessary material in a timely manner). The Final Project Plan will be provided to the Client on 09/27/13 for review and approval.

Tasks Not Included in this SOW:

  • Production Drupal Design or Development
  • Production Salesforce Configuration or Development
